v1.3.2:
- Improved stability when other notifications service are running
- Added an option to use monochrome icons.
- Improved memory usage.

v1.4 - The biggest update in the last months:
- Rearrange settings page. simplified access to many features.
- Notification mode - you choose between grouped and separated. (replaces \"Multiple Events Handling\" option)
- Notification icon - choose between original notification icon, app icon and status bar monochrome icon.
- Icon packs support - use almost any icon pack from Google Play instead of the standard notification icon.
- Choose whether to turn on screen on per app basis.
- Improved stability and memory usage.
- Forcibly turn off screen when timeout passes if \"Screen off (by KATECA)\" app is installed and enabled.
- Better binding with NiLS Floating Panel service. (solves syncing issues)
- All new options affects NiLS Floating Panel too.
